title: List of all Androidrecyclerview   libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidrecyclerview   libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: recyclerview-animators
repoList.description: An Android Animation library which easily add itemanimator to RecyclerView items.

repoList.name: RecyclerViewItemAnimators
repoList.description: An Android library which provides simple Item animations to RecyclerView items

repoList.name: MultiSnapRecyclerView
repoList.description: Android library for multiple snapping of RecyclerView

repoList.name: RecyclerView-FlexibleDivider
repoList.description: Android library providing simple way to control divider items (ItemDecoration) of RecyclerView

repoList.name: android-advancedrecyclerview
repoList.description: RecyclerView extension library which provides advanced features. (ex. Google's Inbox app like swiping, Play Music app like drag and drop sorting)

repoList.name: recyclerview-stickyheaders
repoList.description: DEPRECATED. Android library that integrate sticky section headers in your RecyclerView

repoList.name: recyclerviewhelper
repoList.description: :page_with_curl: [Android Library] Giving powers to RecyclerView

repoList.name: RecyclerViewEnhanced
repoList.description: Android Library to provide swipe, click and other functionality to RecyclerView

repoList.name: CalendarView
repoList.description: A highly customizable calendar library for Android, powered by RecyclerView.

repoList.name: epoxy
repoList.description: Epoxy is an Android library for building complex screens in a RecyclerView
